xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_CONSULATE: A safe has been added in the Consulate Basement
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_DE: Additional security cameras are present. If recorded by security camera, delete evidence within 2 minutes.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_TRIPWIRES_SCHO: Deadly laser tripwires added in the school. Find and equip the disarm device to bypass the lasers.
xx.3868B439: Deadly laser tripwires added in the school. Find and equip the disarm device to bypass the lasers. A high ranking military officer has the device.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SHISHA_ENFORCE: The waiters in the Shisha Café enforce their own disguise, and the bodyguard by the entrance to the Courtyard Club see through all Marrakesh disguises and 47 suits.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_DATA_EXTRACTIO: A laptop has been added in the Consulate
xx.96F9A548: A safe has been added in the Consulate
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_MINEFIE: Deadly landmines added in the market and street close to market. Find and equip the disarm device to bypass the mines. A high ranking security officer has the device.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_GUARDS_: Military Soldiers in Market and surrounding streets enforce the Shopkeeper disguise
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_01: Break into the safe in the school and steal the contents
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_02: Break into the safe in the school and steal the contents
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PROTESTERS_MIL: Strong Millitary presences surrounding the demonstrators
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PYTHON_SAFE_AN: A safe has been added in the antique shop
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_MAINTENEN: A safe has been added in the maintenence room

en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_CONSULATE: A safe has been added in the consulate basement.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_DE: Additional security cameras are present. If recorded by a security camera, delete the evidence within two minutes.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_TRIPWIRES_SCHO: Deadly laser-tripwires have been added to the school. Find and equip the disarm device to bypass the lasers.
en.3868B439: Deadly laser-tripwires have been added to the school. Find and equip the disarm device to bypass the lasers. A high-ranking military officer has the device.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SHISHA_ENFORCE: The waiters in the shisha café see through waiter disguises, and the bodyguard by the entrance to the Courtyard Club sees through all Marrakesh disguises and 47's suits.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_DATA_EXTRACTIO: A laptop has been added to the consulate.
en.96F9A548: A safe has been added to the consulate.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_MINEFIE: Deadly landmines have been added to the market and surrounding streets. Find and equip the disarm device to bypass the mines. A high-ranking security officer has the device.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_GUARDS_: The military soldiers in the market and surrounding streets see through the shopkeeper disguise.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_01: Break into the safe in the school and steal its contents.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_02: Break into the safe in the school and steal its contents.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PROTESTERS_MIL: A strong military presence surrounds the demonstrators.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PYTHON_SAFE_AN: A safe has been added in the antique shop
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_MAINTENEN: A safe has been added in the maintenence room

fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_CONSULATE: Un coffre a fait son apparition dans le sous-sol du consulat.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_DE: Vous êtes épié par plus de caméras. Si l'une d'entre elles vous enregistre, vous avez deux minutes pour effacer la preuve.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_OB: Effacez la preuve vidéo en moins de 2 minutes
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_TRIPWIRES_SCHO: Des mines mortelles ont été posées dans l'école. Trouvez et utilisez le désamorceur pour les neutraliser.
fr.3868B439: Des mines mortelles ont été posées dans l'école. Trouvez et utilisez le désamorceur pour les neutraliser. Il est entre les mains d'un officier militaire haut gradé.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SHISHA_ENFORCE: Les serveurs du bar à chicha ne se laisseront pas berner par leur propre tenue, et le garde du corps à l'entrée du club ne se laissera pas berner par les déguisements de Marrakech et costumes de 47.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_DATA_EXTRACTIO: Un ordinateur a fait son apparition au consulat.
fr.96F9A548: Un coffre a fait son apparition au consulat.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_MINEFIE: Des mines mortelles ont été posées dans le marché et dans les rues le jouxtant. Trouvez le désamorceur pour les neutraliser. Un officier haut gradé l'a en sa possession.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_GUARDS_: Les soldats se trouvant sur le marché et dans les rues ne se laisseront pas berner par le déguisement de vendeur.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_01: Forcez le coffre qui se trouve dans l'école et volez son contenu.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_02: Forcez le coffre qui se trouve dans l'école et volez son contenu.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PROTESTERS_MIL: Une présence militaire importante entoure les manifestants.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PYTHON_SAFE_AN: Un coffre a été ajouté dans le magasin d'antiquités.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_MAINTENEN: Un coffre a fait son apparition dans la salle de maintenance

it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_CONSULATE: È stata aggiunta una cassaforte nel seminterrato del consolato.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_DE: Sono state aggiunte delle telecamere di sorveglianza. Se vieni inquadrato, elimina la registrazione entro 2 minuti.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_OB: Cancella le registrazioni di sorveglianza entro 2 minuti
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_TRIPWIRES_SCHO: Sono state aggiunte delle letali trappole con innesco laser nella scuola. Trova e utilizza il dispositivo di disinnesco per superarle.
it.3868B439: Sono state aggiunte delle letali trappole con innesco laser nella scuola. Trova e utilizza il dispositivo di disinnesco per superarle. Un ufficiale d'alto rango è in possesso del dispositivo.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SHISHA_ENFORCE: I camerieri della caffetteria shisha ti smaschereranno se indossi i loro abiti, mentre la guardia del corpo all'ingresso del Club del Cortile smaschera tutti i travestimenti di Marrakech e gli abiti di 47.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_DATA_EXTRACTIO: È stato aggiunto un portatile nel consolato.
it.96F9A548: È stata aggiunta una cassaforte nel consolato.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_MINEFIE: Sono state aggiunte mine letali nel mercato e nelle strade circostanti. Trova e utilizza il dispositivo di disinnesco per superarle. Il dispositivo è in possesso di un ufficiale d'alto rango.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_GUARDS_: I soldati dell'esercito nel mercato e nelle strade circostanti smascherano il travestimento da negoziante.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_01: Apri la cassaforte della scuola e ruba il contenuto.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_02: Apri la cassaforte della scuola e ruba il contenuto.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PROTESTERS_MIL: Una forte presenza militare circonda i manifestanti.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PYTHON_SAFE_AN: È stata aggiunta una cassaforte nel negozio di antiquariato
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_MAINTENEN: È stata aggiunta una cassaforte nella sala manutenzione

de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_CONSULATE: Dem Keller des Konsulats wurde ein Safe hinzugefügt.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_DE: Zusätzliche Überwachungskameras installiert. Werden Sie von einer Kamera gefilmt, zerstören Sie die Beweise innerhalb von 2 Minuten.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_OB: Vernichten Sie die Aufnahmen innerhalb von 2 Minuten
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_TRIPWIRES_SCHO: In der Schule gibt es tödliche Laserfallen. Finden Sie das Entschärfungsgerät und rüsten Sie es aus, um die Laser zu umgehen.
de.3868B439: In der Schule gibt es tödliche Laserfallen. Finden Sie das Entschärfungsgerät und rüsten Sie es aus, um die Laser zu umgehen. Das Gerät ist im Besitz eines hochrangigen Offiziers.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SHISHA_ENFORCE: Die Kellner im Shisha-Café durchschauen ihre  Verkleidung, wenn Sie sich als sie verkleiden und der Leibwächter am Eingang des Courtyard Clubs durchschaut alle Marrakesch-Verkleidungen und Anzüge von 47.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_DATA_EXTRACTIO: Dem Konsulat wurde ein Laptop hinzugefügt.
de.96F9A548: Dem Konsulat wurde ein Safe hinzugefügt.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_MINEFIE: Auf dem Markt und in den umliegenden Straßen gibt es tödliche Landminen. Finden Sie das Entschärfungsgerät und rüsten Sie es aus, um die Minen zu umgehen. Das Gerät ist im Besitz eines hochrangigen Offiziers.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_GUARDS_: Soldaten am Markt und in den umliegenden Straßen durchschauen die Ladenbesitzer-Verkleidung.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_01: Brechen Sie in den Safe in der Schule ein und stehlen Sie dessen Inhalt.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_02: Brechen Sie in den Safe in der Schule ein und stehlen Sie dessen Inhalt.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PROTESTERS_MIL: Eine starke militärische Präsenz umgibt die Demonstranten.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PYTHON_SAFE_AN: Dem Konsulat wurde ein Safe hinzugefügt
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_MAINTENEN: Dem Wartungsraum wurde ein Safe hinzugefügt.

es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_CONSULATE: Se ha añadido una caja fuerte al sótano del consulado.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_DE: Hay más cámaras de seguridad. Si te graba una cámara, borra las evidencias en menos de 2 minutos.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_ALL_CAMERAS_OB: Borra las pruebas en menos de 2 minutos
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_TRIPWIRES_SCHO: Se han colocado mortales trampas de láser por la escuela. Busca el dispositivo de desactivación y úsalo para neutralizarlas.
es.3868B439: Se han colocado mortales trampas de láser por la escuela. Busca el dispositivo de desactivación y úsalo para sortearlas. El dispositivo lo tiene un oficial militar de alto rango.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SHISHA_ENFORCE: Los camareros de la tetería detectan su propio disfraz, y el guardaespaldas de la entrada detecta todos los disfraces de Marrakech y los trajes de 47.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_DATA_EXTRACTIO: Se ha añadido un portátil al consulado.
es.96F9A548: Se ha añadido una caja fuerte al consulado.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_MINEFIE: Se han colocado minas terrestres mortales en el mercado y sus calles aledañas. Busca el dispositivo de desactivación y úsalo para sortearlas. El dispositivo lo tiene un oficial de seguridad de alto rango.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_MARKET_GUARDS_: Los soldados en el mercado y sus calles circundantes detectan el disfraz de tendero.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_01: Fuerza la caja fuerte de la escuela y roba su contenido.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_SCHOOL_02: Fuerza la caja fuerte de la escuela y roba su contenido.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PROTESTERS_MIL: Una alta presencia militar rodea a los manifestantes.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_PYTHON_SAFE_AN: Se ha añadido una caja fuerte a la tienda de antigüedades.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MARRAKESH_SAFE_MAINTENEN: Se ha añadido una caja fuerte a la sala de mantenimiento.
